channel.title: undefined - Dietrich Ayala
channel.description: Internet freedom, the web and Mozilla.

item.title: SpamAssassin and POP3Proxy Changed My Life
item.description: OK, now I can't say I hate Perl anymore: POP3Proxy allows Windows users a super easy way to use SpamAssassin with Outlook [Express] or any other POP3 mail client. I usually get (no joke) 150-200 junk emails a day, and now I get about 10!!
item.dc:creator: Dietrich Ayala
